root.update: ALTER TABLE `TRANSPORT_PROPOSITION` ADD COLUMN `status` VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL AFTER `price`;
UPDATE `stock`.`PRODUCT` SET `picture`='/Static/img/apple.png' WHERE `id`=135; UPDATE `stock`.`PRODUCT` SET `picture`='/Static/img/potato.png' WHERE `id`=136;
ALTER TABLE `TRANSPORT_PROPOSITION` CHANGE COLUMN `price` `price` DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL AFTER `company_id`;
ALTER TABLE `EMAIL` ADD COLUMN `file_name` VARCHAR(50) NULL AFTER `body`, ADD COLUMN `file` BLOB NULL AFTER `file_name`;
ALTER TABLE `LOT` CHANGE COLUMN `min_price` `price` DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL AFTER `product_id`; ALTER TABLE `TENDER` CHANGE COLUMN `max_price` `price` DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL AFTER `product_id`;

ALTER TABLE `USER` CHANGE COLUMN `password` `password` VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci' AFTER `username`; UPDATE `USER` SET `password`='$2a$10$uzpFt2/Uxp3XWXh/.lTK3uptEwIEw.j4W1aP3MGSuQ3G7HkL2BBRK';
